hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Song of Time# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Shadow Temple## has #4# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #the Thieves' Hideout# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Pocket Egg#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Front Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that something wonderful happens when playing the Song of Storms after planting a magic bean.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Lullaby Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that Phantom Ganon is a big Louisa May Alcott fan.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #House of Twins#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #an Odd Mushroom# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

ToT (Left).text: Ganondorf used to be an adventurer like me, but then he took a light arrow to the knee.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Dead Hand in the well# guards...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ Compass Chest
Bottom of the Well MQ Dead Hand Freestanding Key

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path of time.
